passive.name: Worldly Affairs Leave No Mark
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack an enemy target, there is a {{2, percent}}% base chance to inflict "Unarmored" on the target. While in the Unarmored state, the enemy target receives <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> increased DMG, lasting for {{4}} turn(s). If the target is under a DoT state inflicted by the wearer, there is a {{5, percent}}% base chance to upgrade the "Unarmored" state inflicted by the wearer to the "Cornered" state, which additionally increases the DMG the enemy target receives by <orangeStrong>{{6, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{4}} turn(s). During this period, the wearer cannot inflict "Unarmored" on the target.
